Ms. Heather did state they were also plain excited to get a little muddy.

We have been examining how illustrations contribute to mood, characters, and setting using the book The Napping House by Audrey Wood. This week, we also integrated the book into math. Students have created their own napping houses with different combinations of the characters (granny, child, dog, cat, mouse, flea) within. Today, we traded napping houses and represented the number of legs in each other's houses using multiplication equations.
